CodeChunks.CodeChunk: await Buddy.Coroutines.Coroutine.Sleep(500); ff14bot.Managers.MovementManager.MoveForwardStart(); await Buddy.Coroutines.Coroutine.Sleep(2000); ff14bot.Managers.MovementManager.MoveForwardStop(); await Buddy.Coroutines.Coroutine.Sleep(500);
await Buddy.Coroutines.Coroutine.Sleep(500); while(ff14bot.RemoteWindows.Shop.Open) { ff14bot.RemoteWindows.Shop.Close(); await Buddy.Coroutines.Coroutine.Sleep(1000); }
